    London, New York, Berlin, Turin, Naples, Rome…

    2006-2011

    Lustfaust

    An exercise in fictional archives and mediated histories - focussing upon little-known, 1970s, German noise band, Lustfaust.

    Exhibitions and Performances: ICA, London (April 2006); Freight & Volume, New York (July 2006); Haunch of Venison, Berlin (September 2007); ICA, London (July 2008); Big Chill, Ledbury (August 2008), Rampa del Lingotto, Turin (November 2008); Museo Madre, Naples (June 2009); Tatton Park, Knutsford (May 2010); Fishmarket Gallery, Northampton (July 2010); Grand Union, Birmingham (September 2010); Teatro Eliseo, Rome (Feb 2011)

    Creators/Contributors/Collaborators: Alex Williamson, dandelion + burdock, Euan Rodger, Jamie Shovlin, Laura McLean-Ferris, Lillevan, Mike Harte, Murray Royston-Ward, Patrick Farmer, Peacho, Schneider TM & Kptmichigan, Sigrid Holmwood, Stephen Linehan.

    Archived Website

    Updated: April 02, 2006
